title: Miso-glazed fish
description: Grilled fish marinated in an Asian miso sauce, with a salad of sesame flavoured brown rice
author: Chrissy Freer

dishes.name: miso-marinated fish
steps: Combine the [#1|3 tsp|miso paste], [#2|3 tsp|soy sauce], [#3|0.5|juiced|orange juice], [#4|2 clove(s)|garlic] and [#5|2 tsp|honey] in a glass or ceramic bowl. Add the [#6|fish] and turn to coat. Cover and place in the fridge for 30 minutes to marinate.

Preheat the oven to 200 °C. Drain the fish from the marinade, loosely wrap the fillets in aluminium foil and place on a baking tray. Bake for 12 minutes or until the fish is golden and flakes easily when tested with a fork.

dishes.name: rice and salad
steps: Meanwhile, use a vegetable peeler to peel the [#7|2|trimmed|cucumber] into ribbons. Place the cucumber and [#8|1|peeled and diced|avocado] in a bowl. Add the [#9|1 tbsp|vinegar] and [#10|2 tsp|oil] and toss to combine.
Divide the [#11|2 cup|rice] among plates. Top with the avocado mixture and fish. Sprinkle with the [#12|2 tsp|sesame seeds]. Serve with steamed [#13|steamed|peas or beans]
